name: EpicPay Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: Ameex Technologies

sections.description:
EpicPay has built a strong reputation over many years and thousands of satisfied customers who appreciate our superior service, excellent value, and state of the art technology. We help small to medium-size businesses, churches, non-profits, and larger more enterprise-level clients meet their payment processing needs. Our continued mission is to help our client’s process payments quickly, securely, and with the highest level of confidence. We pride ourselves with our exceptional levels of customer care and desire to make sure our merchants are better off having found us. We are proud to present our official EpicPay extension which provides secure and tokenized Payment Card and ACH (eCheck) transactions directly to our acclaimed EpicPay Gateway.
This extension was designed and developed by EpicPay and built to meet the needs of a dynamic marketplace. It is WooCommerce 3.0 compatible. Our goal is to help merchants drive revenue through a safe, iFrame-based interface while giving new and returning customers a seamless VIP user experience. This vision has served to inform all of our choices when building this extension. Our extension was carefully crafted to optimize the payment checkout experience for your online customers so they will want to return to your site over and over again.

Account Setup

An EpicPay account is required to use this extension. If you don’t yet have an EpicPay account, you can reach out to your EpicPay representative or contact our sales team. We can be reached 866-377-3287 or sales@epicpay.com to setup your account. Visit our website www.epicpay.com to learn more. Our simple online click-to-sign agreement can have you up and running in a matter of minutes. Processing fees apply. Please review all merchant agreements for applicable pricing and terms.

Payment Methods Accepted

*Visa
*MasterCard
*Discover
*American Express
*ACH (eCheck)

Features

*Seamless Checkout Experience: The iFrame-embedded payment form can be customized to match the styles of the shopping cart.
*Authorize and Capture immediately
*Authorize & Capture later (upon shipment/delayed invoice)
*Capture Funds even after authorization expires
*Stored Payment Accounts: Edit orders and support repeat orders without requesting customer credit card or bank account info again
*Transaction Refund
*Partial Refund
*Transaction Void
*Add, Edit, and delete payment methods for customer
*Account updater (optional) for Visa/Mastercard/Discover. **
*Access to the EpicPay Virtual Terminal: Manage your payment form, place transactions, and generate reports
sections.installation:
1. Upload epicpay-woocommerce-gateway folder to the \’/wp-content/plugins/\’ directory
  2. Activate EpicPay Gateway from wp plugin lists in admin area
  3. Plugin will appear in settings of woocommerce
  4. You can set the settings from wocommmerce->settings->Payment->EpicPay Gateway Settings
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Updates to accomodate WordPress 5.5

1.0.3

  • Added rounding logic for amounts submitted with greater than two decimal places.

1.0.2

  • Updates to improve address detail passed to API and virtual terminal.

1.0.1

  • Removed redundant timestamps on transaction notes.
  • Added verbiage improvements on transaction notes.
  • Code cleanup (normalized spacing & indentation).
  • Removed double-notes during a refunded transaction.
  • Minor updates to endpoint routing test/non test.

1.0

  • Initial release

Privacy Policy
